INTRODUCTION

The Sidhi Vinayak Institute Of Professional Education (SVIPE) was established in the year 2012 as a Proprietorship firm but later on in the year of 2013 reformed as Partnership Firm, The various need based courses, Software, Hardware and professional career oriented courses that focus on the pursuit of excellence in Computer Education, Training & Research, Accounts, Taxation, Entrepreneurial Skill Development, Soft & Interpersonal Skills, Soft & Communication Skills. We offer our students the world class courses with good facilities and a world class certification.

  • Strong R & D Team
  • Well Planned Courses.
  • Courses are designed by professionals
  • Providing assignments and projects along with the study material
  • Providing CA supervision to our Accounts & Taxation Courses students also.
Learn More

Background details:

We offers various need based courses, Software, Hardware and professional career oriented courses that focus on the pursuit of excellence in Computer Education, Training & Research, Accounts, Taxation, Entrepreneurial Skill Development, Soft & Interpersonal Skills, Soft & Communication Skills. Our career oriented courses ensure that students learn the skills that make them employable.

Sidhi Vinayak Institute Of Professional Education (SVIPE) is one of the best Institutions to receive the Quality assurance certification ISO 9001:2008 for Computer Training and Education support services and ISO 29990:2010 certification for Providing Vocational Training in Different Trades of National Council of Vocational Training (NCVT), Skill Development Training Under/Through Different Government Departments, Entrepreneurship Skill Development, Entrepreneurial Development Programmes, Tuition and Coaching Classes of all subjects, Coaching and Preparation of Competition Exams, Spoken English and Personality Development Courses, Computerized, Manual & Industrial Accounting Courses, Computer Information Technology (I.T.) Courses, Computer Hardware & Networking Courses, Mobile Repairing & all kind of Electronics Related Training, Basic & Advance Computer Courses, Computer Languages and Programming, Placement Services, all Job Oriented & Self-Employment Oriented Courses, All Kind of Professional Courses, Cutting & Tailoring Courses, Cosmetology & Beautician Courses, Fashion Designing Sector Courses, Garment Sector Courses, Textile Sector Courses, Apparel Sector Courses, Beauty Sector Courses & All Government Aided Courses.

Sidhi Vinayak Institute Of Professional Education (SVIPE) is also committed towards social responsibility. So we are offering free computer education to needy students (Girls/Women), Handicapped and Backward Class Students because our vision is to explorer the women empowerment by the society.

Qualiy Policy

We at SVIPE are committed to make Sidhi Vinayak Institute Of Professional Education (SVIPE) a hallmark in job oriented and practical approached courses to create the value for customer satisfaction , to raise the quality education to global standards, fulfilling the needs and expectations of students and continual up gradation of system

Vision Statement

To enrich students in the field of various need based courses, Software, Hardware and professional career oriented courses that focus on the pursuit of excellence in Computer Education, Training & Research, Accounts, Taxation, Entrepreneurial Skill Development, Soft & Interpersonal Skills, Soft & Communication Skills with quality education and internationally proven scientific techniques and to provide the job oriented courses.

Mission

To provide a dynamic forum for management accounting and finance professionals to develop and advance their careers through certification, research and practice development, education, networking, and the advocacy of the highest ethical and professional practices.

Our Management

Sidhi Vinayak Institute Of Professional Education (SVIPE) is a multi-location various need based courses, Software, Hardware and professional career oriented courses that focus on the pursuit of excellence in Computer Education, Training & Research, Accounts, Taxation, Entrepreneurial Skill Development, Soft & Interpersonal Skills, Soft & Communication Skills in India established by leaders in higher education. Operating at many locations in Punjab & Haryana States of India.

  • Coordinated efforts in curriculum designing,
  • Faculty and student exchange between the centers, and
  • Synchronized Endeavor to strike mutually beneficial corporate relations

Training Domain Activities:

We are offering full-time as well as part-time courses to the students and for working professionals to keep them update with current technologies and enhance their knowledge. We evaluate the skill level of our students by pinpointing their skills with customizable assessment. Meetings are also held with staff on frequent basis and the agenda of the meeting is to optimize the teaching methodologies as well as get familiar with latest information for the same. We conduct house tests for each class monthly; we provide training with latest tools such as Projector, N-Computing environment for the students and exams are conducted for students after the completion of Computer Training undergone by them at regular interval. Our Centers has unique training and support material to meet their needs. We also established Student Welfare Cell (SWC) & Internal Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC). The objectives of these cells are to resolve all kind of issues regarding the welfare of students and to maintain the Quality standard in all aspects. Sidhi Vinayak Institute Of Professional Education (SVIPE) student activism changes lives, through opportunities such as service-oriented spring break trips and organizations like the Students' Smoke free Coalition, which was instrumental in Sidhi Vinayak Institute Of Professional Education (SVIPE) decision to make its campus tobacco-free.

Industry Tie-ups:

We are authorized Study/Counseling centre of various UGC recognized universities. List of the universities has already been mentioned in the Background Detail module. We also have alliance with following private companies:

  • Competent Synergies Pvt. Ltd. For Soft & Communication Skills & BPO Training.
  • Competent Synergies Pvt. Ltd. For Job Placement.
  • Win Edu. Computer Services for Job placement.
  • NITH Pvt. Ltd. For Computer Hardware Networking for on job training & Job Placement.
  • Sarswati Institute of Computers on job training & Job Placement.
  • Success Institute of Information & Technology for Job Placement & on Job Trainings.
  • Sonakshi Enterprises for Job Placement & on Job Trainings.
  • Hitkrish Associates for Job Placement & on Job Trainings.
  • Harji Xerox & Documentation for on Job Training & Placement.
